LanguageData.VGE_GravshipWeaponry.label: gravship weaponry
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipWeaponry.description: Construct gravship artillery and point defense turrets to fight other ships in orbit or provide bombardments from the sky.
LanguageData.VGE_CompactWorkspaces.label: compact workspaces
LanguageData.VGE_CompactWorkspaces.description: Unlock smaller variants of workbenches designed for gravships. Compact enough to fit into tight quarters without sacrificing essential functions.
LanguageData.VGE_OxygenNetwork.label: oxygen network
LanguageData.VGE_OxygenNetwork.description: Harvest and store oxygen for use on gravships. Unlocks construction of vacsuits and other survival gear needed to operate in vacuum.
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelRefining.label: astrofuel refining
LanguageData.VGE_AstrofuelRefining.description: Construct astrofuel synthesizers that automatically convert chemfuel into astrofuel for gravship use.
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipPower.label: gravship power
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipPower.description: Construct gravship solar panelling, gravcore power cells, and astrofuel generators to supply energy for gravship systems.
LanguageData.VGE_HeatDissipation.label: heat dissipation
LanguageData.VGE_HeatDissipation.description: Harvest structural heat generated during gravship launches and dissipate it safely. Excess heat can be converted into usable power.
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipLiving.label: gravship living
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipLiving.description: Build gravship-exclusive furniture such as bunk beds, lockers, and medbay beds to keep crew comfortable and functional in long voyages.
